articles.author: Larry Elliott
articles.title: China is too big for a Soviet Union-style collapse, but it’s on shaky ground - The Guardian
articles.description: With its growth slowing, China’s future is uncertain. We should be grateful if the change is not sudden
articles.content:
Chinas economy is going through a rough patch. Growth is slowing and its property bubble has well and truly burst. Unemployment is rising.
So what, you might say? Every country has difficult periods… [+10621 chars]
